content: मारुत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मरुत इदं अण्] {@--1@} Relating to or arising from the Maruts. {@--2@} Relating to wind, aerial, windy. --तः {@--1@} Wind; <ls>R. 2. 12</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">34</ls>; <ls n="R.">4. 55</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 122.</ls> {@--2@} The god of wind, the deity presiding over wind. {@--3@} Breathing. {@--4@} Vital air, one of the three essential humours of the body. {@--5@} The trunk of an elephant. {@--6@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A son of the Maruts. --ती The north-west quarter. --तं The lunar mansion called Svāti.
